remarks: Show that a group with an element the same order as the group is cyclic.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-Apr-2016.)
statement:
iscygodd.1 $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
iscygodd.o $e |- O = ( od ` G ) $.
iscygodd.3 $e |- ( ph -> G e. Grp ) $.
iscygodd.4 $e |- ( ph -> X e. B ) $.
iscygodd.5 $e |- ( ph -> ( O ` X ) = ( # ` B ) ) $.
iscygodd $p |- ( ph -> G e. CycGrp ) $.
